ships.name: Stratos
ships.description: An old but reliable starter scout ship; given for free and cannot be lost permanently.

ships.name: Zenith
ships.description: An agile interceptor ship with balanced speed and combat capability.

ships.name: Falcon
ships.description: Swift interceptor designed for scouting and high warp speed.

ships.name: Sabre
ships.description: Heavy fighter with substantial firepower and durability.

ships.name: Aurora
ships.description: General-purpose fighter spacecraft with balanced stats.

ships.name: Marlin
ships.description: A nimble vessel that is designed to mine efficiently but be capable of making a quick escape when necessary.

ships.name: Badger
ships.description: An entry-level miner-class ship best suited as a starter mining ship. While it mines more efficiently than the Marlin, it's less capable of making a quick escape.

ships.name: Spectator
ships.description: Admin spectating ship with extreme stats - not normally usable in play.

ships.name: Spectator-X
ships.description: Enhanced version of the Spectator ship for advanced testing.
